name: Robes of Jaundice
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users charisma ILLEGALLY.
It has excellent armour class for its type (magnificent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The ample folds of the robes provide room to embed additional shards.
